domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text: @WHO @MrBean I’m a middle aged man.  I get #coronavirus and I isolate for two weeks.  Then I go back to work.  Why is this different then the flu? Isolate compromised people, healthy people need to get out to build herd immunity. That’s the only way to stop the #pandemic
